trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> class defines the recipient of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)"></xref> constructor constructs an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> class by using the specified recipient certificate.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient> class has the following default property values.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that represents the recipient certificate.
A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)"></xref> constructor constructs an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient"></xref> class by using the specified recipient identifier type and recipient certificate.
A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that represents the recipient certificate.
A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.Certificate"></xref> property retrieves the certificate associated with the recipient.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that holds the certificate associated with the recipient.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.RecipientIdentifierType"></xref> property retrieves the type of the identifier of the recipient.
A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
